sen.j: 妙住寺（みょうじゅうじ）は、奈良県五條市に所在する日蓮正宗の寺院。
sen.e: Myoju-ji Temple is a temple of the Nichiren-shoshu sect located in Gojo City, Nara Prefecture.
Myoju-ji Temple is a temple of the Nichiren-shoshu sect located in Gojo City, Nara Prefecture.
Myoju-ji Temple is a temple of the Nichiren-shoshu sect located in Gojo City, Nara Prefecture.

sen.j: 山号は浄土山（じょうどさん）。
sen.e: Its sango (honorific mountain prefix) is Jodosan.
Its sango (honorific mountain prefix) is Jodosan.

sen.j: 1973年（昭和48年）12月22日 - 建立される。
開基は日蓮正宗大石寺第66世法主日達上人。
sen.e: The patron of the temple in its founding was Nichidai Shonin, the 66th head priest of Nichiren-shoshu Taiseki-ji Temple.
The patron of the temple in its founding was Nichidai Shonin, the 66th head priest of Nichiren-shoshu Taiseki-ji Temple.
The patron of the temple in its founding was Nittatsu Shonin, the 66th head priest of Nichiren-shoshu Taiseki-ji Temple.

sen.j: 1981年（昭和56年）12月10日 - 納骨堂を新築する。
奈良県五條市二見5丁目2-23
sen.e: 2-23, 5 Chome, Futami, Gojo City, Nara Prefecture
2-23, 5 Chome, Futami, Gojo City, Nara Prefecture
2-23, 5 Chome, Futami, Gojo City, Nara Prefecture

sen.j: 和歌山線大和二見駅から徒歩10分
sen.e: Ten-minute walk from Yamato-Futami Station on Wakayama line
Ten-minute walk from Yamato-Futami Station on Wakayama line
